import java.util.*;
public class Q18_Reverse_Triangle_Pattern {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in);
		int num=sc.nextInt();
		for(int i=num;i>0;i--) {
			for(int j=i;j<=num;j++) {
				System.out.print(" ");
			}
			for(int k=1;k<=i;k++) {
				System.out.print("* ");
			}
			System.out.println();
		}
	}

}
